async_info.video_title: Behind the scenes of The Crown Season 3 - BBC News
async_info.video_description:
Olivia Colman succeeds Claire Foy as Queen Elizabeth II in the third series of The Crown.
BBC Breakfast went behind the scenes during filming in Wales. Please subscribe HERE http://bit.ly/1rbfUog

comment_content.original_script: It's Welsh. He's being invested as the Prince of Wales.

async_comment.comment_content_initial: It's Welsh. He's being invested as the Prince of _Wales._

comment_content.original_script: I think Olivia Colman personally doesn't play the queen well in the clips I've seen so far. Claire Foy played the role excellently and far better. Also the queen doesn't have rhoticism like Colman, it's a very bad casting choice I think. I think everyone would have much prefered they had just use some prosthesis to age Foy and Smith. I really hope Colman hasn't ruined the show completely.

async_comment.comment_content_initial: I think Olivia Colman personally doesn't play the queen well in the clips I've seen so far. Claire Foy played the role excellently and far better. Also the queen doesn't have rhoticism like Colman, it's a very bad casting choice I think. I think everyone would have much prefered they had just use some prosthesis to age Foy and Smith. I really hope Colman hasn't ruined the show completely.

comment_content.original_script: I hate celebrities, and I'm gonna tear them all down. It just so happens that I have a bunch of them that are crazy obsessed with me. I'm just playing around now, while they are given the opportunity to prove themselves to me, and if one wants to win, then she'll bring me dinner. Otherwise, I'm hoping to have a real Lady furnished and adorned for me. The Lady isn't a clown jester entertainer. I'm gonna rub it on their loser faces.

I'm just playing around now, while they are given the opportunity to prove themselves to me, and if one wants to win, then she'll bring me dinner. Otherwise, I'm hoping to have a real Lady furnished and adorned for me. The Lady isn't a clown jester entertainer. I'm gonna rub it on their loser faces.
